text: Mania (stylized as M A N I A) is the seventh studio album by American rock band Fall Out Boy. It was released on January 19, 2018. == Track Listing == # Stay Frosty Royal Milk Tea – 2:50 # The Last of the Real Ones – 3:50 # Hold Me Tight or Don't – 3:30 # Wilson (Expensive Mistakes) – 3:36 # Church – 3:31 # Heaven's Gate – 3:45 # Champion – 3:13 # Sunshine Riptide (feat. Burna Boy) – 3:24 # Young and Menace – 3:44 # Bishops Knife Trick – 4:23 ==References== Category:2018 albums Category:Fall Out Boy albums Category:Island Records albums Category:Rock albums
title: Mania (Fall Out Boy album)
